text: Henri Cohen (born ? - died 1930) was a Belgian water polo player. He was of Jewish descent.George Eisen. "Jewish Olympic Medalists". Jewishsports.net. Cohen was swimming for the Brussels Swimming and Water Polo Club. He obtained a silver medal with his team at the 1900 Summer Olympics in Paris. == References == == Other websites == * www.sports-reference.com Category:Year of birth missing Category:1930 deaths Category:Belgian Jews Category:Jewish sportspeople Category:Olympic silver medalists for Belgium Category:Water polo players
title: Henri Cohen
